portfolio.title: Aspectus AI-powered Game
portfolio.description: Built a comprehensive Unity game with AI generated entities and movesets in a cross-functional team using C#, Python, and JavaScript.

portfolio.title: Kubernetes Postgres Operator
portfolio.description: Designed and implemented a kubernetes operator to safely manage multiple postgres database instances within a cluster in the event of pod crashes.

portfolio.title: Blockchain Backend
portfolio.description: Developed a blockchain that uses proof of work to validate transactions and add new blocks.

portfolio.title: S&P-500 Data Pipeline
portfolio.description: Created a high-throughput data pipeline for processing streaming data of the S&P 500 for real-time analytics and ML model training.

portfolio.title: Braille Buddy
portfolio.description: Developed a CNN model on a low-cost RPI platform that translates text from images into braille to allows users to learn braille and convert books into braille.

portfolio.title: Elevator Simulator
portfolio.description: Implemented a multi-car elevator system using UDP sockets to communicate between components.

portfolio.title: RPI Basics
portfolio.description: Tutorial series on using Python to program on a Raspberry Pi Board. Includes Sensehat and GPIO programming, SQLite database integration, and cloud service communicaton.

portfolio.title: C++ Suite
portfolio.description: Tutorial series in C++ for building multi-threaded applications, such as producer consumer, client server with UDP, and state machine design.

portfolio.title: Email SMTP Microservice
portfolio.description: Built a microservice that acts as an email proxy, allowing multiple users to securely send messages to a central recipient.
